name: Claude Data
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's data knowledge work plugin
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's data knowledge work plugin. It defines 1 runtime agent configuration(s): claude-data (ChatBot). The workflow is shaped by 6 rule file(s) (analyze.md, build-dashboard.md, create-viz.md, explore-data.md, validate.md, and 1 more) and 7 skill directory reference(s) (data-context-extractor, data-exploration, data-validation, data-visualization, interactive-dashboard-builder, and 2 more). The bundle includes 6 embedded command doc(s) and 11 embedded skill file(s) from the knowledge-work-plugins package. It is configured to run on image reference(s): us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz.
